mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_organization(id, organization_name, create_time, description) values ( #{id}, #{organizationName}, now(), #{description} )
mapper.update: update t_sys_organization set organization_name = #{organizationName}, description = #{description}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, organization_name as organizationName, create_time as createTime, description as description, version as version from t_sys_organization where id = #{id}
